settings.helpText: Determines if the Register Now Button is visible.
If there are no sections to hide the valid JSON will be an empty string in the array, E.g [""] || ["ContentfulWebinarSection"]

description.en-US: Jamstack Creativity, Performance Optimization and Accessibility.

eventTagline.en-US: Jamstack Creativity, Performance Optimization and Accessibility

content.value: Gatsby is the fast and flexible framework that makes building websites with any CMS, API, or database fun again. Build and deploy headless websites that
drive more traffic, convert better, and earn more revenue.
Sign up to the monthly Gatsby Gazette
and stay up to date with the latest
news, plus hear from our customers and community members who are taking a step beyond the static with

Rive is the new standard for interactive animation. Create rich interactive content with our collaborative editor and render it anywhere (web, products, apps, and games) with our open-source runtimes.
Ready to bring your Jamstack site to life using Gatsby and Rive? To learn step-by-step how this site was made, you can read the full story on the
. Let us know if you create your own similar site by tweeting and tagging
